about_the_game:
The original universe was originally a huge and complete space, but because of a devastating disaster, time and space split, and after that, independent worlds of varying sizes were born, and the original world is one of them!

As one of the only remaining commanders of humans in the old world, we formed a fearless expeditionary force like the ancestors who opened up the new world, crossed the space crack between the old world and came here to investigate.

After entering the original world, we found that the space crack was only one-way, and we could no longer return. In this unknown original world, there are natives with unknown positions and terrifying creatures, as well as those mysterious fogs, which hinder our exploration. And we can only unite and build a home here to survive! Maybe we can find a way back...

Our inspiration for making this game comes from classic sandbox survival games such as "Conan Exiles", "Temple of Valhalla" and "Ark Survival Evolved".

Main feature:

Explore the rich ecosystem in the open world

A brand new primitive world, primitive ecological groups and creatures

The fog of the Elysian Forest

The unknown fog, if you break through forcefully, you will be expelled!

Build a camp & home

Collect resources to build territory stones and build our own home!

Biological interaction

Tame these primitive creatures and defeat them! Earn your rewards, or choose to carry them or use them!

Strategic combat

No weapon restrictions! Freely match the action moves in various postures

Ancient heroic spirits

Powerful ancient spirits scattered around the world can assist us in the battle, but only if you win their trust or sacrifice your life!

Multiplayer

Demo supports steam online function, you can invite online friends in the steam friend list

About the Game

The original universe was originally a huge and complete space, but because of a devastating disaster, time and space split, and after that, independent worlds of varying sizes were born, and the original world is one of them!

As one of the only remaining commanders of humans in the old world, we formed a fearless expeditionary force like the ancestors who opened up the new world, crossed the space crack between the old world and came here to investigate.

After entering the original world, we found that the space crack was only one-way, and we could no longer return. In this unknown original world, there are natives with unknown positions and terrifying creatures, as well as those mysterious fogs, which hinder our exploration. And we can only unite and build a home here to survive! Maybe we can find a way back...

Our inspiration for making this game comes from classic sandbox survival games such as "Conan Exiles", "Temple of Valhalla" and "Ark Survival Evolved".

Main feature:

Explore the rich ecosystem in the open world

A brand new primitive world, primitive ecological groups and creatures

The fog of the Elysian Forest

The unknown fog, if you break through forcefully, you will be expelled!

Build a camp & home

Collect resources to build territory stones and build our own home!

Biological interaction

Tame these primitive creatures and defeat them! Earn your rewards, or choose to carry them or use them!

Strategic combat

No weapon restrictions! Freely match the action moves in various postures

Ancient heroic spirits

Powerful ancient spirits scattered around the world can assist us in the battle, but only if you win their trust or sacrifice your life!

Multiplayer

Demo supports steam online function, you can invite online friends in the steam friend list
name: 无尽之界/Endless Trek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970 (High settings) and 1070 (Ultra settings) or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480 (High settings)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: As the commander of the original human world, we led the vanguard through the portal and entered the unknown original world. The fog here hinders our exploration, and we must unite to build a home here to survive! In this way, we may find a way home. Remember! Don't trust Aboriginal and life here!
